control.label: $VAR[OSDPlot]
control.visible: [Window.IsActive(fullscreeninfo) + IsEmpty(VideoPlayer.Genre) + IsEmpty(VideoPlayer.TVShowTitle) + Skin.HasSetting(General.SmallPlotText) + !StringCompare(Skin.String(OSD.SpinningDiscStyle),Disabled) + !StringCompare(Skin.String(SectionType),homemovies) + !StringCompare(Skin.String(OSD.VideoIconStyle),Disabled)] | [[!Window.IsActive(fullscreeninfo)+ [[StringCompare(Skin.String(OSD.Plot),Paused) + Player.Paused] | StringCompare(Skin.String(OSD.Plot),Always)]] + IsEmpty(VideoPlayer.Genre) + IsEmpty(VideoPlayer.TVShowTitle) + Skin.HasSetting(General.SmallPlotText) + !StringCompare(Skin.String(OSD.SpinningDiscStyle),Disabled) + !StringCompare(Skin.String(OSD.VideoIconStyle),Disabled) + [Skin.HasSetting(OSD.FullResolutionFlag.Enable) | Skin.HasSetting(OSD.MediaFlags.Disable)]]

control.label: $VAR[OSDPlot]
control.visible: [Window.IsActive(fullscreeninfo) + IsEmpty(VideoPlayer.Genre) + IsEmpty(VideoPlayer.TVShowTitle) + !Skin.HasSetting(General.SmallPlotText) + StringCompare(Skin.String(OSD.VideoIconStyle),Disabled)] | [[!Window.IsActive(fullscreeninfo)+ [[StringCompare(Skin.String(OSD.Plot),Paused) + Player.Paused] | StringCompare(Skin.String(OSD.Plot),Always)]] + IsEmpty(VideoPlayer.Genre) + IsEmpty(VideoPlayer.TVShowTitle) + !Skin.HasSetting(General.SmallPlotText) + StringCompare(Skin.String(OSD.VideoIconStyle),Disabled) + [Skin.HasSetting(OSD.FullResolutionFlag.Enable) | Skin.HasSetting(OSD.MediaFlags.Disable)]]

control.label: $VAR[OSDPlot]
control.visible: [Window.IsActive(fullscreeninfo) + IsEmpty(VideoPlayer.Genre) + IsEmpty(VideoPlayer.TVShowTitle) + Skin.HasSetting(General.SmallPlotText) + StringCompare(Skin.String(OSD.VideoIconStyle),Disabled)] | [[!Window.IsActive(fullscreeninfo)+ [[StringCompare(Skin.String(OSD.Plot),Paused) + Player.Paused] | StringCompare(Skin.String(OSD.Plot),Always)]] + IsEmpty(VideoPlayer.Genre) + IsEmpty(VideoPlayer.TVShowTitle) + Skin.HasSetting(General.SmallPlotText) + StringCompare(Skin.String(OSD.VideoIconStyle),Disabled) + [Skin.HasSetting(OSD.FullResolutionFlag.Enable) | !Skin.HasSetting(OSD.MediaFlags.Disable)]]
